# âš¡ LeetAgent - Super Simple Commands

## ğŸ¯ After Setup, Use These Commands:

```powershell
# Login to LeetCode (first time)
leetagent login

# Solve today's daily challenge
leetagent auto

# Check if you're logged in
leetagent session-status

# Interactive menu with more options
leetagent interactive

# Solve a specific problem
leetagent direct https://leetcode.com/problems/two-sum/

# Logout
leetagent logout

# Show version
leetagent version
```

## ğŸ“‹ Quick Start Guide

**Step 1: Open a NEW PowerShell window** (to load the profile)

**Step 2: Try it!**
```powershell
leetagent version
```

**Step 3: Login**
```powershell
leetagent login
```

**Step 4: Solve problems**
```powershell
leetagent auto
```

That's it! No `.\` needed anymore! ğŸš€

## âš ï¸ Important Notes

- Commands work **after opening a NEW PowerShell window**
- The setup was already done for you!
- Works from **any folder** on your computer
- If `leetagent` not found, close PowerShell and open a new window

## ğŸ”¥ Daily Usage (Most Common)

Every day, just run:
```powershell
leetagent auto
```

This will automatically:
- âœ… Fetch today's LeetCode daily challenge
- âœ… Generate AI solution
- âœ… Submit to LeetCode
- âœ… Send you a Telegram notification

**That's it!** One command per day to maintain your streak! ğŸ¯
